bug.author: jtfogarty
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: I attempted to create a notebook server with the following name <denchmark-code>jtf-tf-1.14-01 </denchmark-code>
The creation failed with the below error; <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6708730/73870329-84ed2780-4811-11ea-9eba-6f5754c4d5fc.png></denchmark-link>
What did you expect to happen: The UI should display a message indicating the allowed characters for a notebook name and not allow the Launch button to be selected until the name is valid. Anything else you would like to add: The PVC created successfully so there is a orphaned PVC with no pod. Environment: Kubeflow version: dev_local kfctl version: v1.0-rc.2-13-g521fcfe Kubernetes platform: v1.15.7 Kubernetes version: v1.15.7 OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): NAME="CentOS Linux" VERSION="7 (Core)"
